product_overview: LeadQLandingPage2 is a highly interactive and visually engaging landing page for an AI-powered lead generation platform. It combines advanced animations, real-time data visuals, and user-centric features to showcase the product's capabilities and drive user conversions.
core_goals: Effectively communicate the AI-powered lead generation product's value proposition
Provide an intuitive and visually appealing user experience across devices
Demonstrate key product features through interactive and animated UI components
Encourage user engagement and lead capture through CTAs and contact forms
Ensure compliance with privacy regulations through cookie consent management
key_features: Dynamic header/navigation with tubelight effect, hover dropdowns, and responsive mobile menu
Animated hero section with glass and stardust effect call-to-action buttons
Feature showcase with animated cards and AI capability icons
Interactive AI email drafting animation with typing effects
Dashboard preview with smooth container scroll animations
Visual workflow showing lead generation steps
Showcase of multiple AI agent capabilities
Validated contact form for user inquiries
Final call-to-action with energy beam visual effects
GDPR-compliant cookie consent banner with user preferences
UX utilities including scroll progress, scroll-to-top, and accessibility aids
user_flow_summary: User lands on the hero section, views animated headline and engages with CTA buttons
User scrolls down to explore product features via animated cards and icons
User observes real-time lead capture and AI email draft animations to understand product capabilities
User explores dashboard preview and workflow demonstrations for deeper insight
User checks AI agent capabilities and various use cases for relevance
User reviews pricing plans and customer testimonials for validation
User reads FAQs for additional information
User fills and submits the contact form or schedules a meeting through the booking feature
User consents to cookie preferences through the compliance banner
User completes interaction by engaging with the final CTA to convert or inquire further
validation_criteria: All interactive animations and transitions function smoothly on supported browsers and devices
Navigation header dynamically responds to user interactions and screen sizes
Call-to-action buttons trigger expected routes or actions
Lead capture stream and email drafting animations accurately represent real-time or simulated data capture
Contact form validates inputs and successfully submits inquiries
Meeting scheduler integrates correctly and confirms bookings
Cookie consent banner complies with GDPR requirements and stores user preferences
Accessibility features are implemented correctly, including skip to content and scroll-to-top
Pricing plans and feature comparison are accurate and visually clear
FAQ accordion expands and collapses without UI glitches
Final CTA and other visual effects enhance user engagement without performance issues

features.name: Header/Navigation
features.description: Main navigation header with tubelight navbar effect, hover dropdown menus, and responsive mobile menu

features.name: Hero Section
features.description: Landing page hero section with animated headline, call-to-action buttons using glass and stardust button effects

features.name: Features Section
features.description: Product features showcase with animated cards and icons displaying AI-powered lead generation capabilities

features.name: Lead Capture Stream
features.description: Visual demonstration of real-time lead capture with animated stream visualization

features.name: Email Draft Animation
features.description: Interactive animation showing AI-powered email drafting capabilities with typing effects

features.name: Profile Research
features.description: Component demonstrating AI profile research and enrichment capabilities

features.name: Dashboard Preview
features.description: Interactive preview of the product dashboard with container scroll animation

features.name: Workflow Section
features.description: Visual workflow demonstration showing the lead generation process steps

features.name: AI Agents
features.description: Showcase of different AI agent capabilities for lead generation

features.name: Use Cases
features.description: Different use case scenarios for the lead generation platform

features.name: Pricing Section
features.description: Pricing plans display with feature comparison and CTAs

features.name: Testimonials
features.description: Customer testimonials and social proof section

features.name: FAQ Section
features.description: Frequently asked questions with expandable accordion interface

features.name: Contact Section
features.description: Contact form for user inquiries with form validation

features.name: Bookings/Meeting Scheduler
features.description: Meeting booking functionality integration

features.name: Final CTA
features.description: Final call-to-action section at page bottom with energy beam effects

features.name: Cookie Consent
features.description: GDPR-compliant cookie consent banner with preferences management

features.name: UX Utilities
features.description: Utility components for scroll progress, scroll-to-top, and accessibility features

features.name: Main App
features.description: Root application component that assembles all sections into the landing page

features.name: Styling
features.description: Global styles and Tailwind CSS configuration
